entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher who is firm and strict. She does not permit people to talk when she is talking.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is an interrupting student who is being reprimanded by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: vanishing spell
entities.description: The Vanishing Spell is a difficult magic spell that becomes more complex with the animal to be vanished.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall reprimands Professor Umbridge for interrupting her.
Professor McGonagall teaches the Vanishing Spell to her students.
